column2:
"Thee cometh hither too?
Thee wish to speaketh of
the strange children?"

"They has't consumed thee Kuronites
without exception, including thee
Kuron King."

"Grant you mercy to those folk,
the remaining Kuronites art
running amok in various places."

"If I hadst noticed earlier,
I could hath moved apace to
stand ho the destruction..."
"My most humble apology Kuron King. Kuronites. Father. This shalt still engrave into mine own heart."

"As the maiden of this world,
I has't to clean this mess.
For the Kuronite's sorrow."

"I will contact the Shironian King,
with the events unfolding as they
are now, he will have to agree."
"Nay. Unneedeth sacrifices art unnecessary."
"Tis unnecessary because I shall not require their help."
"Then at least allow me to accompany you..."
"Nay. As mine own guardian, I has't a special task for thee, Kotoshiro."
"The force known as \"Magatsu\", who hast been resurrected, must be contained hither, by protecting this shrine. Thee shouldst knoweth this."
"I understandeth, Kotoshiro. But I doth not wanteth to increase the damage yond hast been done."
"Sukuna-hime..."
"1. Don't be rash now"
"2. We want to help"

"<%me>, Matoi.
Thy concerns for me shalt
be enough."
"Thy shouldeth be more cautious about thineselves."
"I knoweth this might not sound sincere since thee did save me before, but please, doth not worry about me."
"Recall, who doth think I am? I am Sukuna-hime, the Ash Maiden of Harkotan."

"Now please...
Leaveth it to me."

"Sukuna-hime!
She's not going
alone, is she?"

"<%me>!
Kotoshiro!
We need to go after her!"
"Sukuna-hime ordered me to protect the shrine."
"As her guardian, I must follow that order."
"1. Is it really alright?"
"2. What orders!"

"Orders...?
So why were you looking for Sukuna-hime when we first met, Kotoshiro?"
"Before we've met, I'm sure your duty was to protect the shrine too. Now, why is that!?"
"That's..."
"You can't let Sukuna-hime alone all by herself."
"To Sukuna-hime, aren't you the only one she has left, Kotoshiro?"
"There's still time before Sukuna-hime reaches the enemy's side. I want you two to head on first."
"I still have something left to do... A something for my foster mother."
